name: Azine Davoudzadeh
description: Founder of XR EDU, an organization that researches virtual, augmented, and mixed reality solutions for classrooms. Educator, speaker, and thought leader in the XR Education space.

name: Tal Globus
description: A passionate software engineer with expertise in the field of Machine Learning. Cofounder of Stealth Biotech Startup.

name: Annam Quraishi
description: Over 4 years of experience working with startups and in the biotech industry. Her passion is making lasting impacts in the Medtech field through socially-driven businesses.

description: Indira is an open source compliance consultant. Her experience is in open source licensing, processes, tooling and tech M&Aâ€™s. Indira is also a community representative for the Linux Foundations OpenChain Project.

name: Hema Mutyala
description: Hema is a master's student in Software Engineering with specialization in Cloud Computing and virtualization at San Jose State University. She is passionate about solving high impact problems using data and has a strong background in Software Development, Virtualization, and Cloud Computing.
